<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  <title>E-Commerce</title>
  <style>
    /* Global styles */
    body {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #4facfe, #00f2fe);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

header {
  background-color: #000;
  color: #fff;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

header nav {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

header nav a {
  color: #fff;
  margin: 0 20px;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: bold;
  position: relative;
  padding: 5px 10px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

header nav a:hover {
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

#home {
  background-color: blue;
}

#home:hover {
  background-color: #2980b9;
  transform: scale(1.1); /* Adds a scaling effect when hovered */
}

#cart {
  background-color: green;
}

#cart:hover {
  background-color: #27ae60;
  transform: scale(1.1); /* Adds a scaling effect when hovered */
}

.logout-btn {
  background-color: #e74c3c;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 14px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

.logout-btn:hover {
  background-color: #c0392b;
  transform: scale(1.1); /* Adds a scaling effect when hovered */
}

main {
  padding: 40px 10%;
  width: 80%;
  background-color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  margin-top: 20px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  display: flex;
}

.sidebar {
  width: 20%;
  padding: 20px;
  background-color: #f7f7f7;
  border-right: 1px solid #ddd;
}

.filter-section {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.filter-section h3 {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.price-range {
  margin-top: 10px;
}

.price-range input {
  width: 100%;
}

.filter-button {
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  background-color: #27ae60;
  color: #fff;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  width: 100%;
}

.filter-button:hover {
  background-color: #219150;
}

.content {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 20px;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}

.search-bar {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

.search-bar input {
  padding: 10px;
  width: 80%;
  font-size: 16px;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

#product-list {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 20px;
}

.product {
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, border 0.3s ease;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 10px;
  padding: 15px;
}

.product:hover {
  transform: translateY(-10px);
  border: 3px solid green; /* Adds a border on hover */
  box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* Adds a stronger shadow on hover */
}

.product img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.product-info {
  padding: 15px;
}

.product-name {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.product-price {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #27ae60;
}

.add-to-cart {
  background-color: #333;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px;
  border: none;
  width: 100%;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-top: 10px;
}

.add-to-cart:hover {
  background-color: #555;
}

#recommendations {
  margin-top: 40px;
}

#recommendations h2 {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

#recommended-products {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <header>
    <h1>E-Commerce-Website</h1>
    <nav>
      <a href="home.html" id="home">Home</a>
      <a href="cart.html" id="cart">Cart</a>
      <button class="logout-btn" onclick="logout()">Logout</button>
    </nav>
  </header>

  <main>
    <!-- Sidebar for filtering -->
    <div class="sidebar">
      <div class="filter-section">
        <h3>Filter by Price</h3>
        <label for="price-range">Price Range:</label>
        <div class="price-range">
          <input type="range" id="price-range" min="0" max="1000" step="10" oninput="updatePriceLabel()" />
          <p>Selected Price: $<span id="price-label">500</span></p>
        </div>
        <button class="filter-button" onclick="applyPriceFilter()">Apply Price Filter</button>
      </div>
      <div class="filter-section">
        <h3>Filter by Item</h3>
        <label for="item-category">Category:</label>
        <select id="item-category">
          <option value="all">All</option>
          <option value="electronics">Electronics</option>
          <option value="fashion">Fashion</option>
          <option value="home-appliances">Home Appliances</option>
        </select>
        <button class="filter-button" onclick="applyItemFilter()">Apply Category Filter</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Main content -->
    <div class="content">
      <h2>Featured Products</h2>

      <div class="search-bar">
        <input type="text" id="search-bar" placeholder="Search products by name or description..." oninput="filterProducts()" />
      </div>

      <div id="product-list">
        <!-- Product list dynamically inserted here -->
      </div>

      <section id="recommendations">
        <h2>Recommended for You</h2>
        <div id="recommended-products">
          <!-- Recommended products dynamically inserted here -->
        </div>
      </section>
    </div>
  </main>

  <script>
    function updatePriceLabel() {
      const priceRange = document.getElementById('price-range');
      const priceLabel = document.getElementById('price-label');
      priceLabel.textContent = priceRange.value;
    }

    function applyPriceFilter() {
      const selectedPrice = document.getElementById('price-range').value;
      const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => parseFloat(product.price) <= parseFloat(selectedPrice));
      renderProducts(filteredProducts);
    }

    function applyItemFilter() {
      const selectedCategory = document.getElementById('item-category').value;
      const filteredProducts = selectedCategory === 'all' 
        ? products
        : products.filter(product => product.category === selectedCategory); // Assuming each product has a 'category' field
      renderProducts(filteredProducts);
    }

    "image": "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTlv8sZLnUxjk-N0DO7anZgD6342NnBrjsjwQ&s", 
    "description": "High-end product with exceptional features.",

];



    const cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) || [];
    const productList = document.getElementById('product-list');
    const recommendations = document.getElementById('recommended-products');

    function renderProducts(filteredProducts) {
      productList.innerHTML = ''; // Clear the product list
      filteredProducts.forEach((product, index) => {
        const productDiv = document.createElement('div');
        productDiv.classList.add('product');

        const inCart = cart.find(item => item.name === product.name);
        const availableQuantity = inCart ? product.quantity - inCart.quantity : product.quantity;

        productDiv.innerHTML = `
          <img src="${product.image}" alt="${product.name}" />
          <div class="product-info">
            <div class="product-name">${product.name}</div>
            <div class="product-price">$${product.price}</div>
            <div class="product-quantity">Available: ${availableQuantity}</div>
            <div class="product-description">${product.description}</div>
            <div class="product-rating">Rating: ${product.rating}</div>
            <button class="add-to-cart" ${availableQuantity <= 0 ? 'disabled' : ''}>Add to Cart</button>
          </div>
        `;

        const addToCartButton = productDiv.querySelector('.add-to-cart');
        addToCartButton.addEventListener('click', () => addToCart(index));

        productList.appendChild(productDiv);
      });
    }

    function addToCart(index) {
      const loggedinuser= localStorage.getItem("Loggedinuser");

      const product = products[index];
      //save loggedinuser from local storagein the cart
      const existingProductIndex = cart.findIndex(item => item.name === product.name);

      if (existingProductIndex >= 0) {
        if (cart[existingProductIndex].quantity < product.quantity) {
          cart[existingProductIndex].quantity += 1;
        } else {
          alert('Not enough stock!');
          return;
        }
      } else {
        cart.push({ ...product, quantity: 1 });
      }

      localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(cart));
      renderProducts(products);  // Rerender with all products after adding to the cart
    }

    function filterProducts() {
      const searchTerm = document.getElementById('search-bar').value.toLowerCase();
      const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => 
        product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) || 
        product.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)
      );
      renderProducts(filteredProducts);
    }

    function logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem('cart');
    alert('You have been logged out and your cart has been cleared!');
    window.location.href = 'index.html'; // Redirect to login page
  }

    // Initialize the page
    renderProducts(products);
    getRecommendations();
